findings.liver: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass.
findings.bile_duct: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 3 mm. Pneumobilia is likely related to recent ERCP.
findings.gallbladder: The gallbladder is distended, however there is no evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening. There is a small amount of pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: The imaged portion of the pancreas appears within normal limits, without masses or pancreatic ductal dilation.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: The visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
